channel.title: New User Button & Opening links - Project Insanity Client
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape,
This is my custom made 317 PI Client, I am trying to make it so when you click on the 'New User' button it opens 1 webpage and then I'm trying to make a custom login I've done it all but when I'm adding the custom log-in I get this error. Also, I've fixed the Else If error but it still comes up and I need to fix. Can anyone teach me how to do it I'm so confused and need it done.
[img]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/2781/clientnewuser.png[/img]
Thanks,
New Legacy.

item.title: New User Button & Opening links - Project Insanity Client
item.dc:creator: @New_Legacy New Legacy
item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

[quote=“deadlygfx, post:2, topic:420650”]If the “New User” button is clickable then you just have to find where it is(maybe in RSinterface.java) and then add this to it

launchURL("http://URL_HERE");

I hope this helps[/quote]
Yes, I know and it’s in the client.java. I’ve already done that but it opens unlimited browsers until I eventually try and close the game. So that’s a proplem and I want it to display a new custom made login…

Read full topic
item.source: New User Button & Opening links - Project Insanity Client

item.title: New User Button & Opening links - Project Insanity Client
item.dc:creator: @deadlygfx deadlygfx
item.description:
@deadlygfx wrote:

If the “New User” button is clickable then you just have to find where it is(maybe in RSinterface.java) and then add this to it

launchURL("http://URL_HERE");

I hope this helps

Read full topic
